bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: All Pathological Condition of the teeth.

Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry rong yan 戎鹽 quotes Shi yi tong bian yao fa 世醫通變要法. : 牢牙明目：青鹽二兩，白鹽四兩， 川椒四兩，煎汁拌鹽炒干。日用揩牙洗目，永無齒疾目疾 , “To strengthen the teeth and clear the eyes: virid salt, 2 liang ; white salt, 4 liang ; chuan jiao , 4 liang . Boil the latter [in water, remove the dregs, and keep] the liquid to which are added the two types of salt, and heat until dry. Use daily to brush the teeth and wash the eyes, and there will never be tooth ailments or eye afflictions”.
